titles.title: Honoring the life and legacy of Captain Michael D'Angelo Garigan for his service and devotion to his community.
Honoring the life and legacy of Captain Michael D'Angelo Garigan for his service and devotion to his community.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

bill.summary: This resolution honors the life and legacy of Captain Michael D'Angelo Garigan for his lifelong commitment to his community and over three decades of service in law enforcement.
